name: ConRep Studio
short_description: ConRep Studio is an advanced Content Repository management tool. The tool can be used with any JSR170 compliant content repository. The administrator can see different perspectives of the system like content, versioning, search etc. The UI is based on SWT

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
